bibl.title: Rome's Eastern Trade. International Commerce and Imperial Policy, 31 BC - AD 305.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The Red Sea Trade in Egypt. - 3. The Arabian Incense Trade. - 4. The Trade of Palmyra. - 5. Trade in Syria and the North. - 6. The Long-distance Trade and the Imperial Government. - 7. Conclusion. - Appendices. Notes. Bibliography. Index.

London - New York, Routledge, 2001, xv-303 pp., tabl., figg., cartes. ISBN 0-415-24219-3. Â£50.
